findings.message:
Reentrancy in BitcoinQuick.airDropJoin (0xd7aa94f17d60be06414973a45ffa77efd6443f0f.sol#102-118):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(! airDropMembers[msg.sender] && airDrop(airDropVerify).verify(msg.sender,_secret) && airDropHeight > 0 && airDropAmount > 0 && accounts[owner] >= airDropAmount) (0xd7aa94f17d60be06414973a45ffa77efd6443f0f.sol#103-106)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accounts (0xd7aa94f17d60be06414973a45ffa77efd6443f0f.sol#107-108)
	- accounts (0xd7aa94f17d60be06414973a45ffa77efd6443f0f.sol#108-109)
	- airDropHeight (0xd7aa94f17d60be06414973a45ffa77efd6443f0f.sol#112)
	- airDropMembers (0xd7aa94f17d60be06414973a45ffa77efd6443f0f.sol#109-110)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
